alert.note: Alert for Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 2:43PM AKST until November 18 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with reduced visibility. Additional snow accumulations of one to 2 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. North winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Brooks Range in Atigun Pass. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over Atigun Pass. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst conditions are in Atigun Pass. Snow, blowing snow and winds are expected to become less severe late in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
